title: Static Analysis

android.permission.BLUETOOTH.description: Allows applications to connect to paired bluetooth devices.

android.permission.GET_TASKS.description: Allows application to retrieve information about currently and recently running tasks. May allow malicious applications to discover private information about other applications.

android.permission.REORDER_TASKS.description: Allows an application to move tasks to the foreground and background. Malicious applications can force themselves to the front without your control.

certificate_findings: Application is signed with a code signing certificate

Application is signed with v1 signature scheme, making it vulnerable to Janus vulnerability on Android 5.0-8.0, if signed only with v1 signature scheme. Applications running on Android 5.0-7.0 signed with v1, and v2/v3 scheme is also vulnerable.

manifest_analysis.title:
Application Data can be Backed up
[android:allowBackup=true]
manifest_analysis.desc: This flag allows anyone to backup your application data via adb. It allows users who have enabled USB debugging to copy application data off of the device.
manifest_analysis.name: Application Data can be Backed up [android:allowBackup=true]

metadata.cwe: CWE-532: Insertion of Sensitive Information into Log File
metadata.description: The App logs information. Sensitive information should never be logged.

metadata.cwe: CWE-330: Use of Insufficiently Random Values
metadata.description: The App uses an insecure Random Number Generator.

metadata.cwe: CWE-312: Cleartext Storage of Sensitive Information
metadata.description: Files may contain hardcoded sensitive information like usernames, passwords, keys etc.

FCS_RBG_EXT.1.1.choice: The application use no DRBG functionality for its cryptographic operations.

FCS_STO_EXT.1.1.choice: The application does not store any credentials to non-volatile memory.

FCS_CKM_EXT.1.1.choice: The application generate no asymmetric cryptographic keys.

FDP_DEC_EXT.1.2.choice: The application has access to no sensitive information repositories.

FDP_NET_EXT.1.1.choice: The application has no network communications.

FDP_DAR_EXT.1.1.choice: The application does not encrypt files in non-volatile memory.

FMT_MEC_EXT.1.1.choice: The application invoke the mechanisms recommended by the platform vendor for storing and setting configuration options.

FTP_DIT_EXT.1.1.choice: The application does not encrypt any data in traffic or does not transmit any data between itself and another trusted IT product.

strings: "pref_summary_action_help" : "Opens a web page with info about the app and instructions on how to use it"
"pref_summary_auto_launch" : "Automatically launch/close app when bluetooth is enabled/disabled"
"pref_summary_action_restart" : "Restarts the app to apply settings changes"
"pref_summary_action_terminal" : "Allows direct interaction with the interface device"
"msg_error_terminal_lost_binding" : "Lost communication, ensure the app is still running"

"pref_message_elm_commands" : "End each command with a semicolon. It is recommended to always begin with the commands ATWS; ATL0; ATE0; and then include your own initialization and monitoring commands. 

EXAMPLE: ATWS; ATL0; ATE0; ATS1; ATH1; ATSP2; ATMR11;"

"pref_message_elm_monitors" : "Enter the vehicle bus data to monitor for and the desired responses. 

FORMAT: Bus Data | Silence Errors | Bounce Group Time | Short Group Time | Long Group Time | Long Group Watch Time | Short Group Action | Long Group Action 

EXAMPLE: 3D 11 00 02 D4 | false | 120 | 30 | 100 | 300 | *BUTTON_ROOT=KEYCODE_HOME | *BUTTON_ROOT=KEYCODE_APP_SWITCH"

high.title: Application vulnerable to Janus Vulnerability
high.description: Application is signed with v1 signature scheme, making it vulnerable to Janus vulnerability on Android 5.0-8.0, if signed only with v1 signature scheme. Applications running on Android 5.0-7.0 signed with v1, and v2/v3 scheme is also vulnerable.

warning.title: Application Data can be Backed up
warning.description:
[android:allowBackup=true]
This flag allows anyone to backup your application data via adb. It allows users who have enabled USB debugging to copy application data off of the device.

warning.title: The App uses an insecure Random Number Generator.
warning.description:
The App uses an insecure Random Number Generator.
https://github.com/MobSF/owasp-mstg/blob/master/Document/0x04g-Testing-Cryptography.md#weak-random-number-generators

warning.title: Files may contain hardcoded sensitive information like usernames, passwords, keys etc.
warning.description:
Files may contain hardcoded sensitive information like usernames, passwords, keys etc.

secure.title: This application has no privacy trackers
secure.description: This application does not include any user or device trackers. Unable to find trackers during static analysis.

hotspot.title: Found 1 critical permission(s)
hotspot.description:
Ensure that these permissions are required by the application.

android.permission.GET_TASKS (dangerous): retrieve running applications - Allows application to retrieve information about currently and recently running tasks. May allow malicious applications to discover private information about other applications.
